name: quick! save the poems before Earth combusts and everythng is lost forever!
name_original: quick! save the poems before Earth combusts and everythng is lost forever!
description:
It’s the end of the world.

We need to transmit the remnants of human culture to our new home in the stars before Earth combusts and everything ever created upon her goes with it.

Unfortunately, in the rush of preparations to leave Earth, all the poems got separated and mixed in with the ramblings of a dog-obsessed mad woman.

Your job is to put together whatever you can from these fragments and transmit them before Earth is combusted FOREVER.
